The show also boosted careers of comics including Billy Crystal , Arsenio Hall and David Letterman . Don Kirshner gave new, young musicians the opportunity to showcase their performances for a huge audience during the` golden age' of the popular music business, Billy Joel said in a statement.`` At the time, his` hands-off' approach to how rock and John Roll music was presented made television a viable medium for many now-iconic recording artists.''
